description:
Web application security can be an intimidating discipline, yet it can
be of supreme importance for the people who use the things we build.

In this tutorial, you'll learn about essential topics in web security,
and you will gain hands-on practice identifying and leveraging
vulnerabilities in a Python-based web app. For each issue, we will cover
how your code can stay on the side of safety.
title: Getting comfortable with web security: A hands-on session
